title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

quotes: After the 1997 elections, for example, after all the effort we made and the results that were announced.

organizations.name: legislature
quotes: My father, in a way, was a leader, since he was one of the first native persons in our legislature.

roles.title: leader
quotes: My father, in a way, was a leader, since he was one of the first native persons in our legislature.

roles.title: lawyer
quotes: He was a lawyer, but he was also, like I said, the first one to represent the indigenous population in our legislature.

roles.title: teacher
quotes: My mother was a teacher, but that also enabled her to exhibit some leadership by bringing all the — so many of the children in the neighborhood remember her and the role she played.

roles.title: pastor
quotes: She subsequently became a pastor, and that put her in a leadership position in the church.

supporting_quotes: My father, in a way, was a leader, since he was one of the first native persons in our legislature.
